parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic payment. Valid values:

*   **false** (default): disables automatic payment. If you select this option, you must go to Order Center to complete the payment after an order is generated.
*   **true**: enables automatic payment. Payments are automatically completed.

parameters.name: AutoUseCoupon
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use coupons. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description:
The bandwidth value of the bandwidth plan. Unit: Mbit/s.

Valid values: **2** to **2000**.

parameters.name: BandwidthPackageId
parameters.description: The ID of the bandwidth plan that you want to modify.

parameters.name: BandwidthType
parameters.description:
The type of bandwidth. Valid values:

*   **Basic**
*   **Enhanced**
*   **Advanced**

>  You can upgrade **Basic** bandwidth to **Enhanced** bandwidth. You cannot change **Enhanced** or **Advanced** bandwidth to another type of bandwidth.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the bandwidth plan.

The description can be up to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the bandwidth plan. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the GA instance. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
